languages.text: Unit's WS and BS increase by sum of the basic PER Bonus (before any modification) of all living allies in combat.

traits.locale_text: Unit's WS and BS increase by sum of the basic PER Bonus (before any modification) of all living allies in combat.

languages.text: This creature gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to the sum of all living allies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonuses (before any modifiers are applied).

traits.locale_text: This creature gains a bonus to Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill equal to the sum of Perception bonuses of all their living allies in combat.
This creature gains a bonus to Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill equal to the sum of Perception bonuses of all their living allies in combat.

languages.text: Esta criatura gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} igual a la suma de las bonificaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} de todos los aliados con vida (antes de que aplicarse todos los modificadores).
languages.original_text: This creature gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to the sum of all living allies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonuses (before any modifiers are applied).

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} igual a la suma de las bonificaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} de todos los aliados con vida (antes de que aplicarse todos los modificadores).

languages.text: この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}に、<u>生きている味方全員の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}ボーナス</u>分の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: This creature gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to the sum of all living allies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonuses (before any modifiers are applied).

traits.locale_text: この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}に、<u>生きている味方全員の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}ボーナス</u>分の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。

languages.text: 此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}提高，等同于所有存活盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}之和（不含任何修正值）。
languages.original_text: This creature gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to the sum of all living allies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonuses (before any modifiers are applied).

traits.locale_text: 此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}提高，等同于所有存活盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}之和（不含任何修正值）。

languages.text: Diese Kreatur erhält einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} in Höhe der Summe der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmungsboni{/g} aller lebenden Verbündeten (vor Anwendung von Modifikatoren).
languages.original_text: This creature gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to the sum of all living allies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonuses (before any modifiers are applied).

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur erhält einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} und die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g} in Höhe der Summe der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmungsboni{/g} aller lebenden Verbündeten (vor Anwendung von Modifikatoren).

languages.text: Cette créature gagne un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} égal à la somme des bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de tous ses alliés encore en vie (avant application d'éventuels modificateurs).
languages.original_text: This creature gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to the sum of all living allies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonuses (before any modifiers are applied).

traits.locale_text: Cette créature gagne un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} égal à la somme des bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de tous ses alliés encore en vie (avant application d'éventuels modificateurs).

Cette créature gagne un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence balistique{/g} égal à la somme des bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de tous ses alliés encore en vie (avant application d'éventuels modificateurs).

languages.text: Это существо получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, равный сумме бонусов {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g} (до применения модификаторов) всех живых союзников.
languages.original_text: This creature gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to the sum of all living allies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonuses (before any modifiers are applied).

traits.locale_text: Это существо получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, равный <u>сумме бонусов {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} всех живых союзников</u>.

Это существо получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, равный <u>сумме бонусов {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} всех живых союзников</u>.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} niteliklerine yaşayan tüm dost birimlerin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslarının{/g} toplamı (herhangi bir değiştirici uygulanmadan önce) kadar bonus kazanır.
languages.original_text: This creature gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to the sum of all living allies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonuses (before any modifiers are applied).
